actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: Joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States to provide an age limit for Senators and Representatives.

summary.text: Constitutional Amendment - Provides that after the ratification of this article, no person who has attained the age of seventy years shall be eligible for election or appointment to the office of Senator or Representative.

titles.title: Joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States to provide an age limit for Senators and Representatives.
